titleStmt.title: Of the celebration of the King's Coronation-Day, in the famous city of Bathe. A true narrative in the letter sent from thence to Dr. Charleton, physician to his majestie. Vivat Rex.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, fl. 1660-1686.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed. A3v: Bath, April 24. 1661. Willam Smith.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
